### influxdb

The influxdb class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `influxdb` class.

##### `key_resource`

Data type: `String`



##### `resource`

Data type: `String`



##### `software`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influxdb'

##### `gpg_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `gpg_id`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '05CE15085FC09D18E99EFB22684A14CF2582E0C5'

##### `gpg_server`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'eu.pool.sks-keyservers.net'

##### `gpg_source`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'https://repos.influxdata.com/influxdb.key'

##### `repository_manage`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `repos_comment`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'InfluxData repository'

##### `repos_location`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'https://repos.influxdata.com/ubuntu'

##### `repos_release`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '%{::os.distro.codename}'

##### `repos`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'stable'

##### `repos_src`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `repos_bin`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `repos_gpgcheck`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `repos_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influxdb'

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/var/lib/'

##### `configuration_path`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/etc/influxdb'

Data type: `Enum['directory', 'absent']`



Default value: 'directory'

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influxdb.conf'

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

##### `configuration_template`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influxdb/influxdb.conf.erb'

##### `service_defaults`

Data type: `String`



Default value: '/etc/default/influxdb'

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: 'present'

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'influxdb/service-defaults.erb'

Data type: `String`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`

### influxdb::config

This class creates directories and files; configuration and service

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include influxdb::config
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `influxdb::config` class.

##### `metadata_raft`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::metadata_raft

##### `tsm_data`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::tsm_data

##### `tsm_wal`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::tsm_wal

##### `user`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::user

##### `group`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::group

##### `service_defaults`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::service_defaults

##### `configuration_path`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::configuration_path

##### `configuration_file`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::configuration_file

##### `service_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::service_name

##### `service_provider`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::service_provider

##### `service_definition`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::influxdb::service_definition
